img.alt: An analog clock showing the time 5:50. The shorter hour hand is pointing almost at the 6, and the longer minute hand is pointing directly at the 10.

qti-content-body.p: Not quite. The shorter hour hand is almost to the 6, so the hour is still 5. The longer minute hand is pointing at the 10, which represents 50 minutes past the hour. Therefore, the time is 5:50.
